metadata.dataset_name: Tampa Bay Hurricane Bridge Closure Dataset
metadata.description: Historical hurricane and tropical storm data affecting Tampa Bay area bridges, specifically for Tampa General Hospital bridge closure prediction modeling
metadata.notes: Bridge closure times are approximate based on news reports and official statements. Some older storms may have incomplete data. Forward speed calculated from NHC reports.

storms.name: Irma
storms.landfall_location: Marco Island, FL then moved up west coast
storms.notes: Passed east of Tampa Bay, caused negative storm surge initially then positive surge

storms.name: Eta
storms.notes: Made landfall as tropical storm at Cedar Key, caused significant flooding in Tampa Bay

storms.name: Ian
storms.notes: Only Skyway closed - other bridges stayed open. Hit south of Tampa Bay

storms.name: Idalia
storms.landfall_location: Big Bend area near Keaton Beach
storms.notes: Made landfall as Cat 3 well north of Tampa, fast-moving storm

storms.name: Debby
storms.notes: Very slow-moving storm, longest closure. Howard Frankland shoulder washed out. Made landfall as Cat 1

storms.name: Helene
storms.notes: Record storm surge for Tampa Bay despite hitting north. Fast-moving Cat 4

storms.name: Milton
storms.notes: Closest storm to Tampa in dataset, made landfall as Cat 3 just south of Tampa Bay

storms.name: Charley
storms.notes: Expected to hit Tampa but turned east. Minimal bridge impacts in Tampa Bay area despite nearby Cat 4 landfall. No confirmed closures found.

data_dictionary.name: Storm name
data_dictionary.date: Date of closest approach or landfall (ISO format)
data_dictionary.category_at_tampa: Hurricane category (Saffir-Simpson scale) when affecting Tampa Bay area, 0=tropical depression, 1=tropical storm
data_dictionary.max_wind_tampa: Maximum sustained winds in mph affecting Tampa Bay area
data_dictionary.storm_surge_tampa: Storm surge in feet measured or estimated for Tampa Bay
data_dictionary.track_distance_miles: Distance in miles from storm center to Tampa General Hospital at closest approach
data_dictionary.forward_speed_mph: Forward speed of storm in mph
data_dictionary.closure_hours: Total hours bridges were closed (null if no closure)
data_dictionary.bridge_closed_time: Approximate time bridges were closed (ISO format)
data_dictionary.bridge_opened_time: Approximate time bridges were reopened (ISO format)
data_dictionary.bridges_affected: List of bridges that were closed

Sunshine Skyway.notes: Always closes first due to height

Courtney Campbell.notes: Often requires significant cleanup after storms
